metas.description: All the betting and race information for the 2014 Conditional Jockeys Hurdle at the Cheltenham Festival.

page.content:
Cheltenham Festival Day 4 Races - Conditional Jockeys Hurdle Odds

The Conditional Jockeys get their chance on the big stage with this excellent hurdle race, it really is a chance for the young jockeys to have their moment in the sun and a good ride could really give their careers a boost. The race itself is run over 2 miles 4 furlongs so at middles distance the weather could play a part here, it is one of the final races of the Cheltenham Festival though and punters are always eager to get involved.

We have had a few runnings of the race so far but generally the bookmakers have come out on top, in 2009 it was Andytown who won at 25/1 while in 2011 it was Pause And Clause who scored at 14/1.

16:40 Martin Pipe Conditional Jockeys' Handicap Hurdle
1.Killultagh Vic - W Mullins - L Dempsey - 7/1
2.Noble Endeavour - G Elliott - K Sexton - 14/1
3.Roi Des Francs - W Mullins - D Mullins - 3/1F
4.Kauto Grand Mogul - Miss E Doyle - J McGarvey - 33/1
24 Ran
